word_mean: 碳水化物，糖类：多羟醇，特别是五羟醇和六烃醇的醛或酮的衍生物。因氢和氧通常处于形成水的比率，故称
化学式为(CH2O)n。最重要的碳水化物为淀粉、糖、纤维素和树胶。可分为单糖类、二糖类、三糖类、多糖类和杂多糖类

entry.tran: 碳水化合物;糖类;含碳水化合物的食物
entry.def: Carbohydrates are substances, found in certain kinds of food, that provide you with energy. Foods such as sugar and bread that contain these substances can also be referred to as carbohydrates .

example.ex: Food is made up of carbohydrates, proteins and fats.
example.tran: 食物由碳水化合物、蛋白质和脂肪构成。

example.ex: ...carbohydrates such as bread, pasta or chips.
example.tran: 碳水化合物食品,如面包、意大利面食或炸薯条

means.word_mean: 1. an essential structural component of living cells and source of energy for animals; includes simple sugars with small molecules as well as macromolecular substances; are classified according to the number of monosaccharide groups they contain

sentences.en: Athletes usually eat a high carbohydrate diet.

jushi.english: Bread, potatoes, pasta and rice are all high in carbohydrates.
